npv_scenarios.name: Normal
npv_scenarios.description: Principal waived NPV, also known as Principal Forgiveness NPV, is a variant of the Net Present Value (NPV) analysis that considers the impact of principal forgiveness or debt reduction on the profitability of an investment or project.
